name: createReplyAction
title: Reply Action Builder
oneLiner: Reactive state manager for tracking and creating replies to Nostr events

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event to track replies for

returns.name: count
returns.description: Total number of replies to the event

returns.name: hasReplied
returns.description: Whether the current user has replied to this event

returns.name: pubkeys
returns.description: Array of pubkeys who have replied

returns.name: reply
returns.description: Create and publish a reply to the event with the given content
